entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
